head: Bit position
Name
Meaning
rows:
If set, an interactive PDF processor does not allow a user to change the value of the field. Additionally, any associated widget annotations does not interact with the user; that is, they does not respond to mouse clicks nor change their appearance in response to mouse motions.
NOTE: This flag is useful for fields whose values are computed or imported from a database.
If set, the field has a value at the time it is exported by a submit-form action (see 12.7.6.2, "Submit-form action").
If set, the field is not exported by a submit-form action (see 12.7.6.2, "Submit-form action").
